headline: Union Pacific Corporation Declares First Quarter 2026 Dividend
summary: OMAHA, Neb., February 05, 2026--The Board of Directors of Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE: UNP) has declared a quarterly dividend of $1.38 per share on the company’s common stock, payable March 31, 2026, to shareholders of record Feb. 27, 2026.

headline: Union Pacific, Wabtec Strike Landmark $1.2B Locomotive Modernization Deal
summary: Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) is included among the 15 Best Wide Moat Dividend Stocks to Invest in. On February 4, Union Pacific Corporation (NYSE:UNP) and Wabtec reached a $1.2 billion agreement to overhaul Union Pacific’s AC4400 locomotive fleet. headline: GOP members to STB: Find ‘real’ benefits or reject rail merger
summary: Dozens of Senators and Representatives have urged a careful review by federal regulators of the proposed merger of Union Pacific and Norfolk Southern. The post GOP members to STB: Find ‘real’ benefits or reject rail merger appeared first on FreightWaves.

headline: Union Pacific Inks $1.2B Locomotive Modernization Deal With Wabtec
summary: UNP signs a $1.2B Wabtec deal to modernize locomotives, boosting efficiency and reliability while favoring upgrades over replacements.

headline: Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (WAB) Is Up 5.2% After $1.2 Billion Union Pacific Upgrade Deal - What's Changed
summary: Union Pacific recently announced a landmark agreement with Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (Wabtec) worth US$1.20 billion to modernize its AC4400 locomotive fleet in the US, extending asset life while adding new control, diagnostics and fuel‑saving technologies from 2027 onward. This is Union Pacific’s fourth major modernization order with Wabtec since 2018, underscoring sustained demand for the company’s hardware and digital upgrades that target efficiency, reliability and longer...

headline: Wabtec Union Pacific Deal Highlights Rail Modernization And Valuation Tension
summary: Wabtec (NYSE:WAB) and Union Pacific agreed a $1.2b program to modernize 1,700 locomotives. The deal is described as the largest locomotive modernization project in rail industry history. The agreement focuses on fuel efficiency, reliability, and new digital capabilities across a major portion of Union Pacific’s fleet. For you as an investor looking at NYSE:WAB, this agreement highlights how the company’s core rail technology and services sit at the heart of freight rail operations. Wabtec’s...
